numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows a relation between income rate and estimated boost.
2. If the income rate is higher then the estimated boost is higher.
3. I wonder why it matters whether a person is rich or poor.
4. I think that admission should depend on test scores.
5. This issue relates to the community.
6. This issue can affect people who do not have much money.
7. If a person does not have much money then the person may not get into a good college.
8. The headline is: Learn about your admission advantages at high end colleges.
